content:
Hello everyone, the next telco has to be moved to Tu 28.4.2020 instead Mo 27.04.2020 Telco, but time stays the same 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM

Agenda:

  • ch-core 1.0.0 Release done!
  • ch-epr-term 2.0.2 released which incorporates Art-Decor CH-EPR Release 201907.2-stable
  • ch-emed 0.1.0 upcoming

  • ch-core STU2 planning

    • open points from ballot https://github.com/hl7ch/ch-core/milestone/1
    • discussion timeline for next ballot
    • Next Telco: Mo 18.05.2020, 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM
      *AOB

join us via https://join.freeconferencecall.com/oliver_egger
